One of the best games i've ever played.  You'll spend hours on this game levelling up your perks, killing specimens and earning achievements.  There are tons of servers to join with varying difficulties and mods.  An endless amount of maps made by the community.  You can play solo also but don't expect a story with FMV cut scenes.
Zombies, ambiente terrorifico, visualización ZED ... ¿¡Qué mas se le puede pedir!?
DAMM KILLING FLOOR YOU SCARY!!!!

This game can be fun if you play with a group that doesn't leave you to die the second you move a bit too slow.

They also have in-game advertising for their *other* game, you know, the one where you're supposed to die, like in REAL war. =p

リアル寄りなゾンビ狩ゲー プレイ人数は1～6人 Modで最大人数は変更可能
みんなでﾋｬｯﾊｰしてもいいし篭城してＢ級ホラーな体験をしても楽しめる
Modは膨大な量が存在し武器やMap等を追加できる他
操作性を変更したり制限を解除したりできる
個人的には銃声の迫力が一番のお気に入り

Müll. Punkt.

Zombie-Killing-Fest! What is there not to like?!
The game is good, has okay graphics, and has a whole bunch of classes. Alot of levels, and the game keeps getting updated even to the days of today! So yes, this game is worth it. You might find that the aiming can be slightly dodgy. This game actually makes you pay attenttion. Something you may not find in some shooters of today. ;)
Extremadamente adictivo, recomendadísimo si te gustan los juegos co-op en primera persona y matar zombies a lo loco.
Cant write, grinding.

I got killing Floor just before last christmas in 2011.
It is quite different to other survial games. you cannot run you cannot melle unless holding a melle.

basically it takes a bit into getting used to. there are too many achievements.it gets really silly the amount there is. Unless you like sink 3000+ hours into this game you might only get 50% unlocked.

however the maps are really interesting in how they are designed. and loads of servers. custom maps are also in the dozen. it really doesnt seem to be drying up. I have become addicted. and its pretty cool game if you get the hang of it.

you guys should check it out. worth the money. but better to wait for a sale. rather than purchasing the normal price. and get the DLC too.
Best survival horror game!
Amazing game. Runs nice and smooth on some of the lowest computers.
Спасибо Tripwire Interactive за AA-12.
An extremely addicting co-op survival game. There are many classes to choose from and level up. I only wish they updated it more.
a must get game nuff to say ;)
Infinite waves of specimens to kill- infinite fun :)
Best zombie-killing game I have played to date. Left 4 Dead is good but doesn't offer the free-roam gameplay that Killing Floor does. Big selection of weapons and tons of ways to kill those zeds!
If you like penguins you will definately like this game
A good game that provides a good level of fun. More brutal than L4D2 and I like that :) . Another thing to mention is perks and teamplay (in comparison to L4D2) - that's more of a plus than minus.
Enough Zombie killing to be matched up with Left 4 dead, in fact its basically left 4 dead but more focused on wave after wave of zombies. Pure zombie kiling fun.

Best FPS zombie shooter, period. Several third party mods which are free to play and bring an entirely new experience to an already awesome game. 

Get it on sale for next to nothing when you can.
Holla holla get dosh

Move around, look around, incoming zombies, zombies spotted, aim at the zombies, pull the trigger, HEADSHOT, slow-motion, epic slow-motion reloading, throw some slow-mo grenades, look behind you, zombie with a chainsaw, warn your teammates with insults,*breath* switch to a stronger weapon, aim at his head, pull the trigger,*breath* EPIC HEADSHOT IN SLOW-MO, reload, look behind you,*fart* shoot an arrow to a zombie and penetrates 9000 other zombies like a baws, reload and walk away... in slow-motion.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ON-7v4qnHP8
Just an all round good time :)
This is one of the best zombie survival games, but it can get really boring sometimes so play it in short bursts.

With over 900 hours in play time.. I'd say its a pretty sweet FREAKIN' game.  ENDLESS re-playability thanks to the perks AND achievement system.  Playing on less diffulty settings doesn't mean it's easy by any means.  Non-scripted game-play, over half a dozen classes.. learn from this game 'current/future' developers: NON-SCRIPTED game-play = indefinite gameplay.  (I'm typing this drunk, so who cares about grammar/spelling)
cool game=)

a very exciting game play experience. lots of weapons and lots of mutants a wide variety of maps to play. even more if you play on a custom maps servers. you can play solo or multiplayer in FPS point of view.  assult rifles to smg, to pistols and explosives to flamethrowers to melee weapons like chainsaws, katanas, claymore sowrd. the graphics/animations are done really well. Im even surprised this pc im using could handle it and i turned the graphics to its highest. theres even a sound track to listen to while you slay this abomination monstrousities. theres a neat slow motion affect when you get an awesome kill. there can be up to 6 players aginst waves of the specimens up to 10 total with different difficulties. theres alot of characters to choose from also this game is well done great fun passes the time
I urge gamers to try it out happy gaming :)

My friend bought me this game as an attempt to make me feel better after a break-up... IT WORKS! <3 The teamwork, the drive to level up perks, headshots, saving lives, zombie-like specimen, voice actors with accents?! This game's GREAT. :D
Top Grafik. Top Spielerlebnis. Top Spiel !
Отличный зомби хорор, понравится многим играйте наслаждайтесь) убийца лефта)

An all around good horror survival. Lots of good times and quite a few good jump scares if you're not observant enough. The diversity of the guns and the ZED time make this game unique to most FPS' out there. Definitely a game worth picking up.
I'm still awful, but it is hella fun to fight off hoards of zombie-mutants with friends!
Dosh Mate. Moar Dosh Mate

Think of this as one of the games that if released on more that just pc and mac there would be riots all over the place. If you want upgraded weapons character classes and epic boss battles along with seasonal additions to the franchise. This is the game to have and play.
Great CO-OP game, get some friends or make some friends in this awesome but under estimated game!

一分間の買い物に命をかける６人制のゾンビヘッドショット COOP FPS。
２人ぐらいは初心者が混じっていてもカバーできるので野良サーバーでも平和。
各Perk事にEXPを稼ぐレベル制ではあるものの、レベルが上がったら上級難易度に行って住み分けるのであまり気にしなくてOK。
Убивайте его деток!
Поиграйте хорошая вещь )
Naaaasty game A++++++++++++++++++

Probably hands down my favorite game available on Steam so far. Very worth the full price and has plenty of content and progression for hundreds of hours of play. Gameplay can feel repetitive but the abundance of maps really makes up for it.
l4d2 is for scrubs

Шикарный хоррор с отличным геймплеем!  Довольно сложный и это большой плюс. Сравнивать с L4D не стоит, это подобно сравнению NFS с каким-нибудь симулятором. Из минусов можно отметить только не очень красивый интерфейс, но он и не нужен особо. И да, саундтрек очень в тему там. Очень радует карта Aperture, сделанная под второй Portal, постоянно на ней играю.

This game...is...FUCKING....AWESOME. Is this better than L4D2? Why are you askign this question? They're both different games. If you want to know if this game is as good as L4D2, or if you like killing mutants with a shotgun, headshotting them, or using a chainsaw to rip them all, then I seriously recommend this game to you. Oh, and I almost forgot you can set ablaze the mutants. Fucking awesome...
One of those games where if you like to kick ass, you play this. Tons of modded servers to keep you going once you max out everything.
DOSH.
It is fun and is about a game in which you clean floors.
You're pathetic, like a bunch of bloody Millwall fans!
Awesome game if you want to do a zombie shooter with few tactics. Just a straight "Run N' Gun" with some nice perks along with it that you can level up.
Brutal zombie killing with added fun of leveling perks!
There is an old saying about guns. ''When in doubt, SPRAY AND PRAY!!!!''
:D

Отличный кооперативный тактический хоррор-экшен. Чем выше сложность, тем важнее командная игра.
jogo fantástico... muito emocionante, recomendo pra quem gosta de jogos hardcore

Kill everything that moves! 8.5/10
This is a much more improved game in the zombie-killing-fps genre. Cool classes, fun upgrades and guns, and never-ending gore.

L-O-D-S OF E-M-O-N-E. What's that spell? LOADSA MONEY. Prob'ly.

Alright, men! Wads out for the ladies!

Sorry, mate - don't take checks, just LOADS OF MONEY.

This is easily the greatest Co-op game out there, yes and that means better than Left 4 Dead. The guns are so exciting to use, and theres so many, theres many perks to choose from as well, the devs frequently release new maps for more replayability, there holiday specials that change the skin of the zombies, there are many types of zombies, there are enough waves that last a perfect amount of time, up to the patriarch. The graphics are moderate, the slo-motion in the game is incredible, and the best part about this game? It's only 20 bucks! I highly recommend this game, super fun with a group of friends, not many glitches, definatly none that are game breaking. 
Final Score: 9/10

Recommended by Zlodej :-*
DOSH 10/10

I never really got into this game. It's another AI swarm game. Doesn't hit the mark for me. Cool idea, lots of updates and plenty of dynamics. If you are into the demon/undead swarm gameplay, definitely worth the price. Otherwise, it just sits there wasting space.
At first..i don't like because of it graphic...somehow then i think it's not that really bad.U still enjoy the game, teamwork is compulsory!
It's like Counterstrike + Left 4 Dead = WIN
Forget Left 4 Dead, this is the best co-op zombie shooter out there; even if they are not technically zombies.
Crosshairs, objectives? Naah. Massive gore, guns and lots of fun. SURVIVE

Die klassische Zombie-Coop-Ballerorgie
Kling langweilig, macht mit guten freunden aber verdammt viel Laune!
Ist jedoch nichts für dauer-Zocker, da dieses Spiel nach 2-3 stunden relativ eintönig wird und wenig Neues bietet.
Ist aber der Absolute langeweile-Killer für zwischen durch!
Bomb ass shit

To finally write a proper review for this game; I recommend it. I recommend it to anyone who likes difficulty in FPS games, and who can get a crew together to take down some mutant dumptrucks. Workshop support is amazing, servers are dedicated, player-base is active, challenge is suffiecient without being "cheap" or overwhelming, and the mechanics are near-flawless down to the way the perks work. Perks themselves are brilliantly implemented and each role can hold their own while still being a valuable asset to teammates. If you're thinking about picking this game up, do so. It's worth it.
This game is the best around.  No nothing's ever gonna get it down.
It's like L4D but with lots more violence and frustration.

Killing Floor ist ein sehr gut gemachter Horrorshooter. Es gibt verschiedene Arten von Zomies und man kann sich zwischen den Angriffswellen neue Waffen kaufen. Von der M9 (start Waffe) über die Schrotflinte bis hin zum Flammenwerfer oder dem Raketenwerfer ist alles vertreten.
In Deutschland gibt es leider nur die zensierte Version. Die Zensur ist aber ganz leicht zu umgehen. Natürlich sollte man das nur machen, wenn man nicht sosehr an seinem Account hängt. Wer wissen will, wie hoch die Wahrscheinlichkeit ist, entdeckt zu werden, sollte googlen.
Ein gutes Spiel.
This game is fun to play. If you have it play with me. :D
One of the greatest games I have EVER fuckin played
